data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bernor, R. L.,, Tobien, H. (1989): Two small species of Cremohipparion (Equidae, Mammalia) from Samos, Greece. Bayerische Staatssammlung für Paläontologie und historische Geologie 29: 206-226, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.1436534|2 occurrences
